DOCNAME: CASE OF ABDULLAH ALTUN v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic and Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG composed of CARDINAL civilian judges and a military judge , convicted the applicant of the charges against him and sentenced him to death under LAW .
